text: Hi Christian, sorry for taking so long to get back to you I'm super busy at work at the minute but should be freed up a bit in 2-3 weeks. I'm a paint roto lead and compositor at Framestore currently working on Avengers: End Game and a TV series for the BBC. Framestore was my first job in the industry, I started out on a new apprentice initiative and quickly climbed the ladder.
How is your final project going?
